Posts.Content: Svet wrote: Good morning, ladies. I have newsolid module found on breast US as part of routine Mammo/US for which FNA was recommended - BI-RADs 4. Is it better to see a breast surgeon or have interventional radiologist do it. Any downsides to doing FNA? Thanks Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Solid nodule - should I see breast surgeon or have FNA first? Svet Rachel888

Posts.Content: Feb 2, 2018 05:35AM Svet wrote: Thank you everyone for your thoughts. Can I ask for core biopsy? Radiologist on the report wrote fine needle biopsy. Or is this the reason to see a breast surgeon
